title: Jennifer Walters
author: Jennifer Walters
content: What is the reason for doing this?  The family did not state why they exhumed the body but I am wanting to hear your thoughts?https://www.news.com.au/lifestyle/real-life/news-life/family-digs-up-grandma-from-grave-after-10-years-shocked-by-her-appearance/news-story/ebd73f8af9f735fc55298fb6758f51de

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Maybe they had to get DNA to prove something, was she murdered?I don’t know. Could be that she was buried wearing really expensive jewellery or something. Maybe they wanted to move her location, the possibilities are endless to be honest.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: What were they thinking? There are so many scenarios this video can be interpreted. Is this the grandma’s wishes? Did have a special request to be embalmed and dug up ten years later.Did they just want to post something crazy on social media to be famous? I do think that the deceased should stay deceased. For whatever reason it may be for the exhumation should have been kept private. Today with social media, the world shares everything and anything in seconds. Here's a great example of click-bait which in an instant you've seen something you can't unsee.
